This paper was my final term paper for Field Herpetology. In it, I review existing scientific knowledge of the salamanders of central texas (genus *Eurycea*), how these species are affected by urbanization, and the policies in place concerning their protection. As someone who spent most of my childhood in Central Texas, this issue is near and dear to me. Read on to find out more about one of the most unique animal groups of this region!
